// Shop NPC Template
// Generated by RO Agent on 2025-09-02 12:37:39

prontera,150,150,4	script	Test Shop	4_F_01,{

mes "[Test Shop]";
mes "Welcome to my shop!";
mes "What would you like to buy?";
next;

switch(select("Weapons:Armor:Items:Cancel")) {
    case 1:
        // Weapon shop
        callshop "weapon_shop",1;
        break;
    case 2:
        // Armor shop
        callshop "armor_shop",1;
        break;
    case 3:
        // Item shop
        callshop "item_shop",1;
        break;
    case 4:
        mes "[Test Shop]";
        mes "Come back anytime!";
        close;
}

close;
}

// Shop definitions
- shop weapon_shop -1,501,502,503
- shop armor_shop -1,501,502,503
- shop item_shop -1,501,502,503
